message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at the special price of $200. I think you'll agree it's a great deal for such a high-quality product.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $60 is too low, I could be willing to meet you halfway from my original offer. How about $130?
I'm getting close, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
